==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Literally: "of one niúbǐ [[牛比]]." A [[slang]] expression peculiar to Southern China, particularly [[Nanjing]].

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=de 一bǐ
|cat=post
}}

===Postposition===
{{zh-post}}

# {{lb|zh|slang}} [[really]]; [[extremely]]
#: [[這]][[部]][[電影]][[好看]][[的一比]]！ (''[[Traditional Chinese|trad.]]'')
#: [[这]][[部]][[电影]][[好看]][[的一比]]！ (''[[Simplified Chinese|simp.]]'')
#:: ''This movie is '''awesome'''!''
#: [[他]][[跑步]][[跑]][[得]][[搞笑]][[的一比]]！
#:: ''The way he runs is '''bloody''' hilarious!''

===Usage notes===
Used as an [[intensifier]] at the end of an adjective.

===Synonyms===
* {{zh-l|的一米}}

* {{zh-l|了去了}}
